Reviews.Title: “Excellent - beautiful room - extremely accomodating staff”
Reviews.Author: scraplady530
Reviews.Content: originally booked stay january 2011 due illness cancel able finally visit montreal tried save dollars booked 5 nights hotel corner auberge le huge mistake awful hotel write review separately noticed auberge le corner chance stopped available explained situation remembered booked anniversary january unable accommodating available rest stay offered discounted rate look confirmed couldnt staying minute walked auberge le warm feeling beautiful booked executive day helped 201 absolutely gorgeous attention detail unbelievable anniversary card desk bottle sparkling apple cider soft music playing throughout stay extremely helpful giving directions basket breakfast left door morning cute definitely coming auberge le dont understand bad reviews location perfect staff welcoming perfect
